resources.string: Your BMI is underweight, meaning you need to gain weight to become healthy. Eat more than you always do, and exercise daily.
Your BMI is normal, meaning you are healthy. Just exercise often to keep your body healthy
Your BMI is obese, meaning you need to lose you weights. Keep a strict diet and exercise daily.
Your BMI is obese, meaning you are not very healthy and you need to lose you weights. Keep a strict diet and exercise daily.
Since you are underweight, you need to gain in order to be healthy. We created an exercise plan for you to gain weight. Exercise daily and try to eat more that your usual diet
Since you are normal, you can use our different exercise plan to tone your body.
Since you are overweight, you need to lose in order to be healthy and physically fir. We created an exercise plan for you to lose weight. Exercise daily and try to maintain a healthy diet
Since you are overweight, you need to lose in order to be healthy and physically fir. We created an exercise plan for you to lose weight. Exercise daily and maintain a strict diet
